meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting a speed greater than that of sound.
meanings.sent1: The supersonics jet broke the sound barrier effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The sleek supersonics aircraft zoomed through the sky at incredible speeds.
meanings.sent3: The supersonics car was so fast that it left all other vehicles in the dust.
meanings.sent4: Her supersonics reflexes allowed her to react quickly in any situation.
meanings.sent5: The supersonics spaceship traveled faster than anyone had ever imagined possible.

meanings.definition: The branch of aeronautics concerned with the study and use of supersonic speeds.
meanings.sent1: She studied supersonics to understand how planes could fly faster than the speed of sound.
meanings.sent2: The field of supersonics has led to significant advancements in aviation technology.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for supersonics was evident in every lecture.
meanings.sent4: In the world of aeronautics, supersonics is a fascinating area of research.
meanings.sent5: The conference on supersonics attracted experts from around the globe.
